name: They Need To Be Fed 3
description:
4/5 - Touch Arcade
9.5/10 - Arcadelife

360 degree gravity platforming is back! Run, jump, collect, avoid enemies and feed yourself to the monster at the end!

"They Need To Be Fed" is a platformer game in which you can walk in all directions: 360 degree gravity ensures you can never fall off. The series has received very positive reviews so far, and is even bigger now!

They Need To Be Fed 3 is bigger, better, smoother. Levels are generally bigger as well, with more secrets and more things to collect.

Features

* 360 degree gravity
* 7 exciting worlds
* Over 50 hand-crafted levels
* 200+ diamonds to collect
* Smooth, slick visual style
* Epic mode
* Adventure mode (separate game)
* 40 achievements
* Collect secret golden beans
* Unlock special "x" levels
* Groovy soundtrack by Jake Almond

Epic Mode
=========

In addition to the regular game, there is Epic Mode in which you can play the levels again but upside down, and full of new dangers. Not for beginners...

NEW Adventure Mode
==================

Adventure Mode is an entirely separate game mode with interconnected areas you can explore. You get help from various creatures to travel further into a mysterious world. It is more easy-going and has a great ambient background track. Perfect for relaxing in between the regular levels!

Go ahead and feed yourself to the monsters!
